definitions.title: n.pr.div.
definitions.body: Mₑnî, god of fate (award, apportionment; cf. Ar. n. pr. div. Maniyyât, and perh. Manât, We:Skizzen iii.22 f. 189, manawa0tun, Nö:ZMG xi. 1886, 709; in Nab. [[מנותו]] Eut:Nab. No. 2:1, 5, etc.);—[[מִלֵּא לַמְנִי מִמְסָח]] Is 65:11 (‖[[לַגַּד]])—v. Che Di Bae:Sem. Rel. 79.
